 Account acct = new Account(Name = 'SummaryWidgetTest ',
industry ='Banking',
Phone='9177996995-45',
AccPercentage__c=50,
ActiveUsers__c=35,
IsActive__c=False,
CurrencyField__c=100);
insert acct;
ID acctID = acct.ID;


List<JBCXM__PickList__c> pkList = [SELECT id , name FROM JBCXM__PickList__c WHERE
(JBCXM__Category__c = 'Customer Status' or  JBCXM__Category__c = 'Customer stage') AND (JBCXM__SystemName__c = 'ActiveCustomer' or JBCXM__SystemName__c = 'stage3')];

JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c cinfo = new JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c(JBCXM__Status__c = (pkList.get(0)).id ,
JBCXM__Stage__c = (pkList.get(1)).id,
CustPercentage__c =120,
InRegions__c='India; America; England',
IsActive__c=True,
CurrencyField__c=32,
JBCXM__ASV__c=6000,
JBCXM__MRR__c=500,
JBCXM__OriginalContractDate__c=date.Today(),
JBCXM__OneTimeRevenue__c=5000,
JBCXM__Users__c=34,
JBCXM__Account__c=acctID);
insert cinfo;
                                         
 // Add a case to this account.
    case cs = new case(
        Status='New',
        Origin='Email',
        AccountId=acctID);
    insert cs;
